REC.r_id_disclaimer: ResearcherID data provided by Clarivate Analytics

grant.grant_agency: Weather and Climate Impact Assessment Science Program

abstract_text.p: This article describes the extreme value analysis (EVA) R package extRemes version 2.0, which is completely redesigned from previous versions. The functions primarily provide utilities for implementing univariate EVA, with a focus on weather and climate applications, including the incorporation of covariates, as well as some functionality for assessing bivariate tail dependence.
